dmca.title: Email Author Complains Cat Breeder Site Infringes
dmca.body:
Complaint of Copyright Infringement Against www.pedigree-cbs.org

[private]
Attn: User Support, DMCA complaints

1. The copyrighted work at issue is two emails authored by myself, posted to this website without my permission. It is at the bottom of the page, under the title ""Lollimop's steals copyright article"

Search query: Purrshinka

Google results: Lollimop's himalayan steal copyright article
... Thank you for your attention to this matter, [private] Persians owner of Persian Cats Online Services 12/22/04:...
www.pedigree-cbs org/copy.html - 7k - Cached - Similar pages
[More results from www.pedigree-cbs.org]	j
[name], [address], New Waterford, Ohio 44445 [email]
[private], [private]; Beaumont, CA. 92223
[private@yahoo.com], [private@verizon.net],
5. "I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law." The "response" quoted was my email, verbatim. I did not, nor do I now, give permission for this to be reproduced in any form. Her reproduction of my email does not constitute fair use under US copyright law, not having been used in part, for editorial or reporting purposes.
"I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."
